item.text: Ahithophel said to Absalom, “Let me pick out 12,000 men. Then I will go and pursue David this very night.

When I <st data-num="0935" class="">catch up</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">with</st><n id="1" /> him <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> will be <st data-num="03023" class="">exhausted</st> and <st data-num="07504 03027">worn out</st>.<n id="2" /> I will <st data-num="02729" class="">rout</st> him, and the <st data-num="03605" class="">entire</st> <st data-num="05971" class="">army</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">that</st> is <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> him will <st data-num="05127" class="">flee</st>. I will <st data-num="05221" class="">kill</st> <st data-num="0905" class="">only</st> the <st data-num="04428" class="">king</st>
and will bring the entire army back to you. In exchange for the life of the man you are seeking, you will get back everyone. The entire army will return unharmed.”
This seemed like a good idea to Absalom and to all the leaders of Israel.

But <st data-num="053" class="">Absalom</st> <st data-num="0559" class="">said</st>, “<st data-num="07121 04994 01571 ">Call</st> for<n id="1" /> <st data-num="02365" class="">Hushai</st> the <st data-num="0757" class="">Arkite</st>, and let’s <st data-num="08085" class="">hear</st> <st data-num="04100" class="">what</st> <st data-num="01571 01931">he</st> has to <st data-num="06310" class="">say</st>.”<n id="2" />
So Hushai came to Absalom. Absalom said to him, “Here is what Ahithophel has advised. Should we follow his advice? If not, what would you recommend?”
Hushai replied to Absalom, “Ahithophel’s advice is not sound this time.”

<st data-num="02365" class="">Hushai</st> went on to <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, “<st data-num="0859" class="">You</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">know</st> your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> and his <st data-num="0376" class="">men</st>—<st data-num="01992" class="">they</st> are <st data-num="03588 01368">soldiers</st> and <st data-num="01992" class="">are</st> as <st data-num="04751 05315">dangerous</st> as a <st data-num="01677" class="">bear</st> out in the <st data-num="07704" class="">wild</st> that has been <st data-num="07909" class="">robbed of</st> her <st data-num="07909" class="">cubs</st>.<n id="1" /> Your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> is an <st data-num="04421" class="">experienced</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">soldier</st>; he will <st data-num="03808" class="">not</st> <st data-num="03885" class="">stay overnight</st> <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> the <st data-num="05971" class="">army</st>.

<st data-num="06258" class="">At this</st> <st data-num="02009" class="">very</st> <st data-num="06258" class="">moment</st> <st data-num="01931" class="">he</st> is <st data-num="02244" class="">hiding out</st> in <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> of the <st data-num="06354" class="">caves</st> <st data-num="0176" class="">or</st> in some <st data-num="0259" class="">other</st> similar <st data-num="04725" class="">place</st>. If it should <st data-num="01961" class="">turn out</st> that he <st data-num="05307" class="">attacks</st> our troops <st data-num="08462" class="">first</st>,<n id="1" /> <st data-num="08085" class="">whoever</st> <st data-num="08085" class="">hears about</st> it will <st data-num="0559" class="">say</st>, ‘<st data-num="053" class="">Absalom’s</st> <st data-num="05971 0834 0310">army</st> has <st data-num="01961" class="">been</st> <st data-num="04046" class="">slaughtered</st>!’

If that happens <st data-num="01571" class="">even</st> the <st data-num="02428" class="">bravest</st> <st data-num="01121" class="">soldier</st>—<st data-num="01931" class="">one</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> <st data-num="03820" class="">is</st> <st data-num="0738" class="">lion</st>-<st data-num="03820" class="">hearted</st>—will <st data-num="04549" class="">virtually</st> <st data-num="04549" class="">melt away</st>. <st data-num="03588" class="">For</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> <st data-num="03045" class="">knows</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">that</st> your <st data-num="01" class="">father</st> is a <st data-num="01368" class="">warrior</st> and that those <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> are <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> him are <st data-num="01121 02428">brave</st>.

My <st data-num="03289" class="">advice</st> <st data-num="03588" class="">therefore</st> is this: <st data-num="0622" class="">Let</st> <st data-num="03605" class="">all</st> <st data-num="03478" class="">Israel</st> from <st data-num="01835" class="">Dan</st> <st data-num="05704" class="">to</st> <st data-num="0884" class="">Beer Sheba</st>—in <st data-num="07230" class="">number</st> like the <st data-num="02344 0834">sand</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">by</st> the <st data-num="03220" class="">sea</st>—<st data-num="0622" class="">be mustered</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">to</st> you, and you <st data-num="01980" class="">lead</st> them <st data-num="06440" class="">personally</st> into <st data-num="07128" class="">battle</st>.

We will <st data-num="0935" class="">come</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">against</st> him <st data-num="0259 04725 0834">wherever</st> he happens to be <st data-num="04672 08033">found</st>. We will <st data-num="05117" class="">descend</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> him <st data-num="0834" class="">like</st> the <st data-num="02919" class="">dew</st> <st data-num="05307" class="">falls</st> <st data-num="05921" class="">on</st> the <st data-num="0127" class="">ground</st>. <st data-num="03808" class="">Neither</st> he nor <st data-num="03605" class="">any</st> of the <st data-num="0582" class="">men</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> are <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> him will be <st data-num="03498" class="">spared alive</st>—not <st data-num="0259" class="">one</st> <st data-num="01571" class="">of them</st>!
If he regroups in a city, all Israel will take up ropes to that city and drag it down to the valley, so that not a single pebble will be left there!”

Then Absalom and all the men of Israel said, “The advice of Hushai the Arkite sounds better than the advice of Ahithophel.” Now the Lord had decided to frustrate the sound advice of Ahithophel, so that the Lord could bring disaster on Absalom.
Then Hushai reported to Zadok and Abiathar the priests, “Here is what Ahithophel has advised Absalom and the leaders of Israel to do, and here is what I have advised.

Now send word quickly to David and warn him, “Don’t spend the night at the fords of the wilderness tonight. Instead, be sure you cross over, or else the king and everyone who is with him may be overwhelmed.”

Now Jonathan and Ahimaaz were staying in En Rogel. A female servant would go and inform them, and they would then go and inform King David. It was not advisable for them to be seen going into the city.

But a <st data-num="05288" class="">young man</st> <st data-num="07200" class="">saw</st> them on one occasion and <st data-num="05046" class="">informed</st> <st data-num="053" class="">Absalom</st>. So the <st data-num="08147" class="">two</st> of them <st data-num="04120" class="">quickly</st> <st data-num="01980" class="">departed</st> and <st data-num="0935" class="">went</st> <st data-num="0413" class="">to</st> the <st data-num="01004" class="">house</st> of a <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> in <st data-num="0980" class="">Bahurim</st>. There was a <st data-num="0875" class="">well</st> in his <st data-num="02691" class="">courtyard</st>, and they <st data-num="03381" class="">got down</st> <st data-num="08033" class="">in it</st>.
His wife then took the covering and spread it over the top of the well and scattered some grain over it. No one was aware of what she had done.

When the servants of Absalom approached the woman at her home, they asked, “Where are Ahimaaz and Jonathan?” The woman replied to them, “They crossed over the stream.” Absalom’s men searched but did not find them, so they returned to Jerusalem.

After the men had left, Ahimaaz and Jonathan climbed out of the well. Then they left and informed King David. They advised David, “Get up and cross the stream quickly, for Ahithophel has devised a plan to catch you.”
So David and all the people who were with him got up and crossed the Jordan River. By dawn there was not one person left who had not crossed the Jordan.

When Ahithophel realized that his advice had not been followed, he saddled his donkey and returned to his house in his hometown. After setting his household in order, he hanged himself. So he died and was buried in the grave of his father.
Meanwhile David had gone to Mahanaim, while Absalom and all the men of Israel had crossed the Jordan River.

<st data-num="053" class="">Absalom</st> had <st data-num="07760" class="">made</st> <st data-num="06021" class="">Amasa</st> general <st data-num="05921" class="">in command of</st> the <st data-num="06635" class="">army</st> <st data-num="08478" class="">in place of</st> <st data-num="03097" class="">Joab</st>. (Now <st data-num="06021" class="">Amasa</st> was the <st data-num="01121" class="">son</st> of an <st data-num="03481" class="">Israelite</st> <st data-num="0376" class="">man</st> <st data-num="08034" class="">named</st> <st data-num="03501" class="">Jether</st>, <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> had <st data-num="0935 0413">married</st><n id="1" /> <st data-num="026" class="">Abigail</st> the <st data-num="01323" class="">daughter</st> of <st data-num="05176" class="">Nahash</st> and <st data-num="0269" class="">sister</st> of <st data-num="06870" class="">Zeruiah</st>, <st data-num="03097" class="">Joab’s</st> <st data-num="0517" class="">mother</st>.)
The army of Israel and Absalom camped in the land of Gilead.
When David came to Mahanaim, Shobi the son of Nahash from Rabbah of the Ammonites, Makir the son of Ammiel from Lo Debar, and Barzillai the Gileadite from Rogelim

brought <st data-num="04904" class="">bedding</st>, <st data-num="05592" class="">basins</st>, and <st data-num="03335" class="">pottery</st> <st data-num="03627" class="">utensils</st>. They also <st data-num="05066" class="">brought</st> <st data-num="0398" class="">food</st> for <st data-num="01732" class="">David</st> and <st data-num="05971" class="">all</st> <st data-num="0834" class="">who</st> were <st data-num="0854" class="">with</st> him, including <st data-num="02406" class="">wheat</st>, <st data-num="08184" class="">barley</st>, <st data-num="07058" class="">flour</st>, <st data-num="07039" class="">roasted grain</st>, <st data-num="06321" class="">beans</st>, <st data-num="05742" class="">lentils</st>,<n id="1" />
honey, curds, flocks, and cheese. For they said, “The people are no doubt hungry, tired, and thirsty there in the desert.”
